TopicTitle: Mars Spirit/Opportunity mission = $1.8b. Drawing a penis on Mars = Priceless

Articles.Content:
This is a real pic taken by the Mars rover Spirt. You can see there her wheels prints after a mission.

Who said that being a NASA engineer was boring? Kerbalesc, isn't it?
"Growing old is mandatory. Growing up is optional."

"Growing old is mandatory. Growing up is optional."

"What's the point of being grown up if you can't be childish sometimes?"
Haha that's awesome. The first Martian graffiti just had to be a giant cock.
Best use of taxpayer dollars since the moon landing.
Grow up? There is no such thing, my dear.
Best use of a mars rover ever. If I could do tracks in KSP, I would do the same.
If this is from the MER missions, why'd it only surface now? Something interesting to post during the conjunction?

If this is from the MER missions, why'd it only surface now? Something interesting to post during the conjunction?

Yeah I'm confused, some headlines I've read said that it's the Curiosity that made this...
Judging from the tracks, it is from one of the MER craft, because the treadlines are parallel while Curiosity's wheels famously have a chevron pattern that prints JPL in morse code as it drives.
Hmm, That makes me think there should be rover tracks and when your pod or something hits the ground dirt should fly up and around it, making a crater type thing on that save. like on the main menu.
This thread is more suited to Off-Topic. General Discussion is only for KSP-related discussion. Thread moved.

Is this even allowed due to the forum rules? I mean look at the rules: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/15254-Forum-Rules it says something about adult content... Not that i think it's a problem, but... So please keep the thread anyways. Maybe with a big ADULT CONTENT marker at the top?

And by the way, i actually saw this in the newspaper today

I would have originally posted "Inb4 moderator", but since Ted has been through here I shall just say Inb4 the lock

If I'm not permitted to draw a groggy female kerbal waking up in the morning than I am actually very disappointed that a discussing about how a rover's trail just happens to resemble male genitalia is permitted by the mods.

It' okay to moderate, but please moderate consistently.
I think it'd be better if they did this on the moon... on mars it'll be blown away (he he) by the wind after a while.
